title: Cannot sync testnet blockchain
body:
#### System information

Geth version:

```
resurtm@resurtm-desktop:~/ethereum/go-ethereum$ ./build/bin/geth version
Geth
Version: 1.4.17-stable-3885907c
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.7.1
OS: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=/usr/lib/go-1.7
```

OS & Version:

```
resurtm@resurtm-desktop:~/ethereum/go-ethereum$ uname -a
Linux resurtm-desktop 4.7.0-1-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.7.5-1 (2016-09-26) x86_64 GNU/Linux

resurtm@resurtm-desktop:~/ethereum/go-ethereum$ cat /proc/version 
Linux version 4.7.0-1-amd64 (debian-kernel@lists.debian.org) (gcc version 5.4.1 20160904 (Debian 5.4.1-2) ) #1 SMP Debian 4.7.5-1 (2016-09-26)

resurtm@resurtm-desktop:~/ethereum/go-ethereum$ screenfetch
         _,met$$$$$gg.           resurtm@resurtm-desktop
      ,g$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$P.        OS: Debian testing stretch
    ,g$$P""       """Y$$.".      Kernel: x86_64 Linux 4.7.0-1-amd64
   ,$$P'              `$$$.      Uptime: 1h 13m
  ',$$P       ,ggs.     `$$b:    Packages: 2599
  `d$$'     ,$P"'   .    $$$     Shell: bash 4.4.0
   $$P      d$'     ,    $$P     Resolution: 1920x1200
   $$:      $$.   -    ,d$$'     DE: XFCE
   $$\;      Y$b._   _,d$P'      WM: Xfwm4
   Y$$.    `.`"Y$$$$P"'          WM Theme: Next
   `$$b      "-.__               GTK Theme: Raleigh [GTK2]
    `Y$$                         Icon Theme: Tango
     `Y$$.                       Font: Sans 10
       `$$b.                     CPU: Intel Core i3 CPU 540 @ 3.067GHz
         `Y$$b.                  GPU: GeForce 9500 GT/PCIe/SSE2
            `"Y$b._              RAM: 1498MiB / 5961MiB
                `""""           

resurtm@resurtm-desktop:~/ethereum/go-ethereum$ cat /etc/debian_version 
stretch/sid
```

Commit hash : 

```
resurtm@resurtm-desktop:~/ethereum/go-ethereum$ git rev-parse --verify HEAD
3885907c7deb598ed491ca4deccc562b27b31d66
```
#### Expected behaviour

Testnet blocks must start syncing.
#### Actual behaviour

Testnet blocks are not syncing.
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Use command:

```
./build/bin/geth --testnet --fast
```
#### Backtrace

```
resurtm@resurtm-desktop:~/ethereum/go-ethereum$ ./build/bin/geth --testnet --fast
I1016 13:19:11.238128 ethdb/database.go:83] Alloted 128MB cache and 1024 file handles to /home/resurtm/.ethereum/testnet/chaindata
I1016 13:19:11.387945 ethdb/database.go:171] closed db:/home/resurtm/.ethereum/testnet/chaindata
I1016 13:19:11.388452 ethdb/database.go:83] Alloted 128MB cache and 1024 file handles to /home/resurtm/.ethereum/testnet/chaindata
I1016 13:19:11.498208 ethdb/database.go:83] Alloted 16MB cache and 16 file handles to /home/resurtm/.ethereum/testnet/dapp
I1016 13:19:11.503292 eth/backend.go:172] Protocol Versions: [63 62], Network Id: 2
I1016 13:19:11.504438 core/genesis.go:92] Genesis block already in chain. Writing canonical number
I1016 13:19:11.504519 eth/backend.go:180] Successfully wrote custom genesis block: 0cd786a2425d16f152c658316c423e6ce1181e15c3295826d7c9904cba9ce303
I1016 13:19:11.504604 eth/backend.go:201] Blockchain DB Version: 3
I1016 13:19:11.507613 core/blockchain.go:214] Last header: #1735324 [e00875c0…] TD=390062768871272
I1016 13:19:11.507641 core/blockchain.go:215] Last block: #1735324 [e00875c0…] TD=390062768871272
I1016 13:19:11.507660 core/blockchain.go:216] Fast block: #1735324 [e00875c0…] TD=390062768871272
I1016 13:19:11.508121 eth/handler.go:114] blockchain not empty, fast sync disabled
I1016 13:19:11.514355 p2p/server.go:313] Starting Server
I1016 13:19:11.526309 p2p/nat/nat.go:111] mapped network port udp:30303 -> 30303 (ethereum discovery) using NAT-PMP(192.168.1.1)
I1016 13:19:11.592191 p2p/discover/udp.go:217] Listening, enode://307b608555c885a6111556051003f8a182782c6bb6339996c449af5fbefeabfeba81ed4b81bab62bfdd6afbce536ce24720f9e767400f7b9d402114cb11af07e@178.88.25.211:30303
I1016 13:19:11.592533 p2p/server.go:556] Listening on [::]:30303
I1016 13:19:11.593565 node/node.go:296] IPC endpoint opened: /home/resurtm/.ethereum/testnet/geth.ipc
I1016 13:19:11.602009 p2p/nat/nat.go:111] mapped network port tcp:30303 -> 30303 (ethereum p2p) using NAT-PMP(192.168.1.1)
I1016 13:23:31.592842 eth/downloader/downloader.go:319] Block synchronisation started
```

And it stays like for infinite amount of time. Trying to sync testnet blocks for about one week without any success.

```
I1017 16:44:41.814589 eth/downloader/downloader.go:319] Block synchronisation started
I1017 16:45:34.795332 eth/downloader/downloader.go:298] Synchronisation failed: receipt download canceled (requested)
```

Some news:

```
I1017 23:22:20.276434 eth/downloader/downloader.go:319] Block synchronisation started
I1017 23:38:00.937269 eth/downloader/downloader.go:611] Peer 07e7ce055dd5e52f [hs 0.00/s, bs 0.00/s, rs 0.00/s, ss 0.00/s, miss    0, rtt 11.736105388s]: head header set (item 0) broke chain ordering: requested 1735132, got 1735147
I1017 23:38:20.741954 eth/downloader/downloader.go:611] Peer 82b19a66aa647500 [hs 0.00/s, bs 0.00/s, rs 0.00/s, ss 0.00/s, miss    0, rtt 11.736105388s]: head header set (item 0) broke chain ordering: requested 1735132, got 1735147
I1017 23:40:22.887157 eth/downloader/downloader.go:298] Synchronisation failed: state data download canceled (requested)

```

I'm also having issues with Ethereum Wallet GUI Client under MS Windows. Check it here: https://github.com/ethereum/mist/issues/1318

I cannot even start to use Ethereum. :-(
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
